   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(skip_case_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: -include("ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: suite() ->
   28:     [].
   29: 
   30: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   31:     Config.
   32: 
   33: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   34:     ok.
   35: 
   36: init_per_group(_,Config) ->
   37:     Config.
   38: 
   39: end_per_group(_,_) ->
   40:     ok.
   41: 
   42: init_per_testcase(skip_in_init,Config) ->
   43:     {skip,"Skipped in init_per_testcase/2"};
   44: init_per_testcase(fail_in_init,Config) ->
   45:     ct:fail("Failed in init_per_testcase/2");
   46: init_per_testcase(exit_in_init,Config) ->
   47:     exit(self(),"Exit in init_per_testcase/2");
   48: init_per_testcase(_,Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: end_per_testcase(fail_in_end,_) ->
   52:     ct:fail("Failed in end_per_testcase/2");
   53: end_per_testcase(exit_in_end,_) ->
   54:     exit(self(),"Exit in end_per_testcase/2");
   55: end_per_testcase(_,_) ->
   56:     ok.
   57: 
   58: all() ->
   59:     [skip_in_spec,
   60:      skip_in_init,
   61:      fail_in_init,
   62:      exit_in_init,
   63:      fail_in_end,
   64:      exit_in_end,
   65:      skip_in_case,
   66:      req_auto_skip,
   67:      fail_auto_skip
   68:     ].
   69: 
   70: %% Test cases starts here.
   71: skip_in_spec(Config) ->
   72:     ct:fail("This test shall never be run. "
   73:             "It shall be skipped in the test spec.").
   74: 
   75: skip_in_init(Config) ->
   76:     ct:fail("This test shall never be run. "
   77:             "It shall be skipped in init_per_testcase/2.").
   78: 
   79: fail_in_init(Config) ->
   80:     ct:fail("This test shall never be run. "
   81:             "It shall fail in init_per_testcase/2.").
   82: 
   83: exit_in_init(Config) ->
   84:     ct:fail("This test shall never be run. "
   85:             "It shall exit in init_per_testcase/2.").
   86: 
   87: fail_in_end(Config) ->
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: exit_in_end(Config) ->
   91:     ok.
   92: 
   93: skip_in_case(Config) ->
   94:     {skip,"Skipped in test case function"}.
   95: 
   96: req_auto_skip() ->
   97:     [{require,whatever}].
   98: req_auto_skip(Config) ->
   99:     ct:fail("This test shall never be run due to "
  100:             "failed require").
  101: 
  102: fail_auto_skip() ->
  103:     faulty_return_value.
  104: fail_auto_skip(Config) ->
  105:     ct:fail("This test shall never be run due to "
  106:             "faulty return from info function").
